Uses of Package

  • Classes in Unnamed Package used by Unnamed Package
    Class
    Description
    Client
    The Client class represents a client that sends a Logic instance of a checkers game to a server using a Socket connection.
    GameUI
    This class represents the user interface of the game
    Logic
    This class represents the logic of the checkers game
    ScoreManager
    The ScoreManager class is responsible for managing the game score and timer.
    Server
    The Server class represents a server that listens for incoming connections and receives the instance of the game logic from clients.
    SettingsUI
    This class represents the user interface of the settings
    Square
    This class represents one square of the board
    SquareState
    This enum represents the state of one square of the board
    StatisticsManager
    The StatisticsManager class manages game statistics.
    StatisticsUI
    This class represents the user interface of the settings
    TryConnectionClient
    The TryConnectionClient class represents a client that continuously tries to establish a connection with a server at a specified IP address and port.
    TryConnectionHost
    The TryConnectionHost class represents a host that listens for incoming connections from clients on a specified port.
